course.subject: MATH
course.name: Independent Study: Ordinary Differential Equations
course.description: This is a standard course in ordinary differential equations, which includes first order and second order differential equations and their initial value problems. The method of Laplace transform is discussed also, and finally systems of first order differential equations are studied by methods of matrix algebra. Students should seek instructor's approval to take this course.
course.prerequisites: MATH 2111 OR MATH 2121 OR MATH 2131
course.exclusions: MATH 2350, MATH 2351, PHYS 2124
